00014     ("External",cv::RETR_EXTERNAL)    
00015     ("List",    cv::RETR_LIST)        
00016     ("CComp",    cv::RETR_CCOMP)

00021 const ConstMap<std::string,int> ContourType = ConstMap<std::string,int>
00022     ("None",        cv::CHAIN_APPROX_NONE)
00023     ("Simple",        cv::CHAIN_APPROX_SIMPLE)
00024     ("TC89_L1",        cv::CHAIN_APPROX_TC89_L1)

00034 void mexFunction( int nlhs, mxArray *plhs[],
00035                   int nrhs, const mxArray *prhs[] )
00036 {
00037     // Check the number of arguments
00038     if (nrhs<1 || ((nrhs%2)!=1) || nlhs>2)
00039         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00040     
00041     // Argument vector
00042     vector<MxArray> rhs(prhs,prhs+nrhs);
00043     Mat image(rhs[0].toMat(CV_8U));
00044     vector<vector<Point> > contours;
00045     vector<Vec4i> hierarchy;
00046     int mode = CV_RETR_EXTERNAL;
00047     int method = CV_CHAIN_APPROX_NONE;
00048     Point offset;
00049     for (int i=1; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00050         string key = rhs[i].toString();
00051         if (key=="Mode")
00052             mode = ContourMode[rhs[i+1].toString()];
00053         else if (key=="Method")
00054             method = ContourType[rhs[i+1].toString()];
00055         else if (key=="Offset")
00056             offset = rhs[i+1].toPoint();
00057         else
00058             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00059     }
00060     
00061     // Process
00062     findContours(image, contours, hierarchy, mode, method, offset);
00063     plhs[0] = MxArray(contours);
00064     if (nlhs > 1) {
00065         vector<Mat> vc(hierarchy.size());
00066         for (int i=0;i<vc.size();++i)
00067             vc[i] = Mat(1,4,CV_32SC1,&hierarchy[i][0]);
00068         plhs[1] = MxArray(vc);
00069     }
00070 }
